changelog.info:
0807
- Fixed fod icon disappear after pressing
- Fixed Spanish language mismatch
- Fixed sometimes Alert Slider not working
- Add back high refresh rate blacklist for some apps
- Remove prebuilt Google Recorder on gapps build

0805
- Switch to User build
- Revert back to previous screen off gestures
- Set color mode to saturated by default
- Fixed invisible fod icon on white background
- Remove high refresh rate blacklist for some apps
- DeviceSettings: Add a toggle to mute media volume on silent mode
- DeviceSettings: Add Kcal display color calibration
- DeviceSettings: Add FPS overlay customizations
- DeviceSettings: Switch to Lineage implement of doze (Ambient display gestures)
- DeviceSettings: Update Dolby Atmos from OnePlus 9R
- DeviceSettings: Overall cleanup and improvement
- Kernel: Add Kcal support
- Kernel: Add Wireguard support
- Kernel: Fixed video stutters in some apps
- Kernel: Disable some logspams
- Import translations for OnePlus Settings & ConfigCenter
- Other minor cleanup and fixes
